definition.en: A term as broad as European. In American usage, Asian is generally used to refer to the entire continent of Asia; often, however, Asian is used as shorthand for East Asians, or East and Southeast Asians. (DSG) People living in a general region which encompasses China, India, Indonesia, Bangladesh, Japan, Korea, Philippines, Vietnam, Thailand, Taiwan, Cambodia, Hong Kong, Singapore.

scopeNote.en: This is an umbrella term which should not be assigned to either groups of people or an individual person. Refer to the specific nationality if possible.
